title: S3 Ep14: The coronavirus shock to financial stability
itunes:title: The coronavirus shock to financial stability
description: Enrico Perotti tells Tim Phillips that while regulatory reform means that banks are unlikely to be at risk, the same is not true for the shadow banking sector. Does this threaten financial stability, and what should policymakers do about it?
itunes:author: VoxTalks
dc:creator: VoxTalks
